explanation: The issue lies in the calculation of 'ret'. The formula should take into account the initial value of 'P' and add 'D[i]' instead, instead of subtracting 'Q'. The corrected line changes 'ret = P - Q + D[i]' to 'ret = P + D[i]'.
fixed_code:
N, P, Q = map(int, input().split())
D = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = P
for i in range(N):
    ret = P + D[i]
    ans = min(ans, ret)

print(ans)
